mission_data.mission_description: CONFIDENTIAL SIMULATION^An unknown ship has appeared, and you are tasked with conducting First Contact reconnaissance. ^^DETAILS^1-8 ship compatible. shuttles enabled^Ship type and propulsion selectable.^Full, Explore, & Combat variants^Unscaled, Randomized^^Created for the 2021 Online Armada scripting contest by Neal Schlein

big_message.title: First Contact
big_message.subtitle1: by Neal Schlein, TSN Online Armada 2021
big_message.subtitle2: Artemis 2.7.5, adapted from Eaton Command Pt 1

event.name: Sides Fixed Clear all buttons
event.incoming_comms_text: Normal communications have been restored; data sharing has been enabled.^^Good work--now make sure to deploy the remaining relays!

disabled_event.name: MASTER On-Sides Comms Menu Player SLOT

event.name: First Contact Comms

big_message.title: Historical Simulation Initiated
big_message.subtitle1: Skaraan and Hole in the Wall First Contact

event.incoming_comms_text: USING THE COMMS MENU^^1. Drag Comms button list up or down to see all options.^^2. Press the button with your Ship Number (1-8) to access your ship's commands.^^3. The Comms Menu is shared among all ships on a side. Share nicely, as pressing a button alters the menu on all allied ships.^^TO RESET MENU IN CASE OF ERROR:^Set Engineering Sensor Power to 0%^Set Engineering Sensor Coolant to 8^^Back button should reset on all Comms clients.

warning_popup_message.message: NOTE: To reset Comms, set Sensor Power 0%, Coolant Max

event.warning_popup_message: TO RESET MENU^Set Engineering Sensor Power to 0%^Set Engineering Sensor Coolant to 8^^Back button should reset on all Comms clients.^^^USING THE MENU^^1. Drag Comms button list up or down to see all buttons.^^2. Press the button with your Ship Number (1-8) to access your ship's commands.^^3. The Comms Menu is shared among all ships on a side. Share nicely, as pressing a button alters the menu on all allied ships.
event.incoming_comms_text: Encrypted Transmission... Decryption Complete...^^Terran Command is tracking an unknown vessel approaching your location. All attempts at communication have been unsuccessful. We believe it may be heading back toward its home sector.^^Intel requests that you immediately deploy sensor relays to the marked locations. ^^Do not engage the unknown ship at this time. Further instructions will follow.^^HINT: ^1. Must be within 800m to deploy relay.^2. Use this time to become familiar with the Comms Menu.

event.name: First Contact Type Select
event.incoming_comms_text: Use the buttons to select a Historical Simulation Mode...^^1. Full Sim (The entire historical simulation)^^2. Partial Sim: Explore (Attempt reconnaissance of the unknown sector)^^3. Partial Sim: Combat (Recreate the historical combat events)

event.name: First Contact Deploy Complete Return to Station
event.warning_popup_message: All Sensor relays are deployed. Return to Listening Post 1 and await further instructions.
event.incoming_comms_text: All Sensor relays are deployed. Vessel approaching. Withdraw and await further instructions.^^Scan, but do not approach or engage the vessel.

event.name: First Contact Ship Remove
event.incoming_comms_text: The unknown vessel is withdrawing. ^Intel is reviewing the data you collected. Please await further instructions.

event.name: Historical Events Announcement
event.incoming_comms_text: CONFIDENTIAL MATERIAL^This simulation recreates the TSN's initial contact with two forces.^^Intel advises careful analysis of enemy sensor readings.^^Due to public relations concerns, it is strictly forbidden to disseminate this simulation to members of the media or researchers.

event.name: Mission Announce Full and Explore
event.incoming_comms_text: Decryption Complete...^This is Sector Command. ^^The following information is currently classified as top-secret.^^The unknown vessel has been identified as belonging to a race referred to as "Skaraan." We know little about them; Intel has tracked the ship back to another sector, and advised an immediate scouting operation. ^^As the nearest ships, you have been selected to conduct reconnaissance. Remote sensor data is being highly distorted. Once in-sector, you may be on your own--even local comms may not work.^^You will be provided with the necessary jump coordinates, and have been allocated a single supply ship--the TSN Long Haul. ^^The Long Haul's navigational equipment is outdated; you will need to place several NAV buoys before it can safely follow you. Positional data has been supplied to your computers.

event.name: Mission Briefing Full & Explore & Jump to sector Button
event.incoming_comms_text: MISSION PARAMETERS^For now, this is a scouting mission only! Avoid detection and do not engage enemies if possible. ^^Mission Goals^--Map all system features.^--Investigate and deploy relay nodes to counteract interference.^--Install spy tags on all ALIEN bases and capital ships located.^^OPTIONAL: Place NAV Buoys to summon the TSN Long Haul.^^Good luck.^^SYSTEM BEARING: 180

warning_popup_message.message: Goal 3: Tag alien bases and ships

event.name: Mission Announce COMBAT
event.incoming_comms_text: BACKGROUND ONLY; OBJECTIVES COMPLETE^Decryption Complete...^This is Sector Command. ^^The following information is currently classified as top-secret.^^The unknown vessel has been identified as belonging to a race referred to as "Skaraan." We know little about them; Intel has tracked the ship back to another sector, and advised an immediate scouting operation. ^^As the nearest ships, you have been selected to conduct reconnaissance. Remote sensor data is being highly distorted. Once in-sector, you may be on your own--even local comms may not work.^^You will be provided with the necessary jump coordinates, and have been allocated a single supply ship--the TSN Long Haul. ^^The Long Haul's navigational equipment is outdated; you will need to place several NAV buoys before it can safely follow you. Positional data has been supplied to your computers.

event.name: Mission Briefing COMBAT & Jump to sector Button
event.incoming_comms_text: MISSION PARAMETERS (COMBAT ONLY)^^Mission Goals^--Eliminate all ALIEN forces.^--Leave none alive.^^^Good luck.^^SYSTEM BEARING: 180

event.name: COMBAT ONLY ADJUSTMENT
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Terran Command.^^We have learned enough--the Skaraans are working with the Arvonians and Kraliens. You have new instructions:^^Destroy all enemy forces. Leave no enemy alive, accept no surrender, and let no one escape.^^Repeat: PROCEED WITH EXTREME PREJUDICE.

set_ship_text.name: Unknown
set_ship_text.hailtext: Like we're going to let you dock!

event.name: Mission Briefing

set_ship_text.name: TSN Long Haul
set_ship_text.hailtext: We'll let you know when we have supplies ready for you; just don't get us in trouble, eh?

set_ship_text.name: Sharp
set_ship_text.hailtext: What do you need? My orders are to protect the Long Haul.

set_ship_text.name: Falcon
set_ship_text.hailtext: I hope you all can keep us safe out here. I can't see anything on the scopes.

event.name: Resupply Ready
event.incoming_comms_text: We have two supply loads ready for you. Just come on by the ship.^^The next batch will be ready in 5 minutes.^^Long Haul Out.

event.name: Initiate Extreme Prejudice
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Terran Command.^^We have learned enough--the Skaraans are working with the Arvonians and Kraliens. You have new instructions:^^Destroy all enemy forces. Leave no enemy alive, accept no surrender, and let no one escape.^^Repeat: PROCEED WITH EXTREME PREJUDICE.
